reviews.title: Great new hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a beautiful, clean, and modern hotel with excellent facilities but management does not yet quite have its act together. We arrived on Christmas Day and had to wait 15 minutes to check in because the sole employee at the reception desk was attending to the needs of another arriving guest who required adjoining rooms, which are apparently scarce at the hotel. More significantly, although the hotel offers free hot and cold breakfast, by 9:00 AM on the Sunday following Christmas, they had run out of almost everything. The staff apparently under-estimated the number of guests and ordered an inadequate amount of breakfast foods. No offer of recompense was made until we first asked for a discount and then pointed to the sign at the front desk saying payment was not required if you were not "satisfied." The manager then agreed to "comp" us for one night. We used the swimming pool, which was clean and not crowded and had an abundance of towels. The rooms are well-equipped but, as expected with a budget-class hotel, the linens are not pressed. It did seem rather ridiculous that only one flimsly bar of soap was supplied for a 2-night stay for 2 guests. There should, at least, be separate bars for the sink and shower. We will give the hotel another try as it is convenient for us but it is not yet being run as a full quality property.
reviews.title: Not Quite Living Up to Potential

reviews.text: This Hampton Inn lives up to its great reviews. It is in wonderful condition: the lobby and common areas are very attractive and have an urban, upscale feel. They brought a roll away for our second child free of charge, they held our room without the credit card, there was an ATM on site, they had menus from restaurants that deliver to the room. Half of my family was going into the city and the other half of us were sick. This was such a comfortable place to recover. My son and I were left here without a car, and were able to have everything we could possibly need without having to leave the hotel. The staff was very attentive and helpful. Made our trip to NYC much more affordable.
reviews.title: Comfortable, clean and well planned

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Exceeded my Expectations

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Spent a night at the Hampton Inn in Yonkers and couldn't be any happier. The staff is extremely friendly, and the hotel is immaculate. It is about time Yonkers citizens have a hotel in the city that they can trust will take care of their friends and family.
reviews.title: Finally a great Hotel in Yonkers
